alert.note: Alert for Chouteau (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 12 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of north central Montana, including the following counties, Blaine, Chouteau, Hill and Liberty. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 319 PM MDT, Emergency management reported flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Havre, Chinook, Chester, Big Sandy, Harlem, Beaver Creek, Azure, Sangrey, Agency, Boneau, Parker School, St. Pierre, Box Elder, Gildford, Inverness, Fort Belknap, Joplin, Hays, Turner and Lothair. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
